reviewText: Mom wanted this video ever since she saw it the first time many many years ago.  Excellent surprise present for just being her. Got me some well earned brownie points for this one.
this is a hilarious movie, what I want to know is WHY ISN'T IT ON DVD !!!  if you still have a VCR it is worth the watch
Now this is an under rated comedy--judge reinhold is delightful as the silly brother in law. aka  ENID IS SLEEPING

Good humerous movie, lots of laughs!!
Elizabeth Perkins was hilarious  got into situations you could not imagine for love, a must buy....
I watched this movie for the first time the night I learned my husband was terminally ill. Pleased as punch that I was able to purchase it and enjoy it over and over
If you like sight gags, this is a great movie.  A seemingly dead wife causes havoc for a husband and his girlfriend.  Ends with a surprise.  by fallingwillow
